column17:
Nonin GO2 LCD Finger Pulse Oximeter (Green) Price: Rs.9500

Key Features

  • Fingertip Pulse Oximeter
  • LCD Display
  • AAA Alkaline Batteries

The Pulse Oximeter is a small medical device that is designed to analyse and measure the saturation of oxygen in your blood. This reading along with your pulse rate aids a medical professional to properly assess and provides adequate treatment. Serious illnesses like chronic obstructive pulmonary disease heart disease or emphysema can be monitored and managed by using this device to aid your doctor’s decisions.

The Nonin GO2 LCD Finger Pulse Oximeter is perfect for use at home due its  . This American product is durable compact and easy to use which allows you to administer the test safely and quickly. The Nonin GO2 uses non-invasive methods to gauge the oxygen level in the blood while also calculating the beats per minute of your heart.

Build

The Nonin GO2 LCD Finger Pulse Oximeter is ergonomically designed to fit perfectly around the finger with causing any strain or discomfort to the patient. The Nonin GO2 LCD Pulse Oximeter can be used with kids as well as adults as it has a finger thickness range of 0.3 inches to 1.0 inch. The vital information that is collected is displayed on the digital LCD screen that has dimensions of 2.75 x 1.5 x 1.125 inches. The main results shown on this LCD screen are the saturation of oxygen in the blood and the pulse rates of the heart (bpm).

The Nonin GO2 LCD Finger Pulse Oximeter has undergone drop-tests to ensure that it is durable enough not to get damaged when dropped accidentally. The compact design of the Nonin GO2 allows it to be highly portable which means you can carry it effortlessly to wherever it is required.

Performance

The Nonin GO2 LCD Finger Pulse Oximeter is designed to be water-resistant in order to protect the device from perspiration and other forms of moisture. A single AAA alkaline battery is used to power this Nonin Oximeter. The Nonin GO2 LCD Finger Pulse Oximeter is able to approximately manage 2400 spot checks on a new battery as it does not use much energy.

The Nonin GO2 LCD Finger Pulse Oximeter is calibrated to read +/- 2 for oxygen saturation and +/- 3 beats per minute for pulse rate. Thus this Nonin medical device is suitable for homes with young children and older family members who have a history of chronic respiratory problems as it will help them understand and deal with their medical conditions effectively.
